Class.name: Custom.SWARH.HIPS.ws.v1.q3.PatientParticipationStatus
Class.Description: <summary> The information in this class represents the current PCEHR participation status for a patient. It holds all the information required for the calling system to identify the patient record, including the MRN, the state patient identifier and the validated IHI. </summary> Created from: http://sahipsh00.swarh.net:50500/HIPSServer_TEST/HIPS.Service.ConsentService.svc?xsd=xsd5

Property.name: HospitalCode
Property.Description: <summary> A code in the in the hospital code system that was specified in the service request, which identifies the hospital that allocated the MRN. </summary>

Property.name: Mrn
Property.Description: <summary> A patient identifier unique within the hospital, typically allocated by the hospitalâ€™s PAS or PMI. </summary>

Property.name: ParticipationStatus
Property.Description: <summary> Gets or sets the current participation status of the patient. </summary>

Property.name: StatePatientId
Property.Description: <summary> Gets or sets a patient identifier unique within the state or territory and typically allocated by the enterprise master patient index. </summary>

Property.name: ValidatedIhi
Property.Description: <summary> Gets or sets an Individual Healthcare Identifier (IHI) allocated by the national healthcare identifier service, and the information required to check the validity of the IHI. </summary>
